post.body: night lady
uh oh! tell me about it when u get home! I haven't heard from you today.
happy half-birthday!
put on some more clothes!
what's this about being crippled? what happened?
g'night very soon
night sir
praying for you...right now & continuing..til u get well!
lucky!!
ouch!
i look forward to conversing with you through this period. I'd love to get to know more about ur thoughts & ideas!
you say unfortunately. why? what role does gov't intervention have in freedom and democracy?
BUT, I wish you well in this endeavor
if u truly are from the federal gov't then i highly doubt u will set anything right. It's not the place of gov't to make it ok.
the big 3 would benefit from bankruptcy reorg...the uaw has strong-armed them for too long.
cool response
it happens for several reasons: oil is a commodity, control by OPEC, no new refineries in 30 years...
lol...i could have figured. but u know HE didn't mean it as a compliment!
World History is only boring when we fail to recognize the significance of the events as they apply to our lives today
glad to hear it!
g'night
g'night
lol
night
night
g'night sir
ha ha ha.,..gotta love the new puppies.
that they are. i hope the increased memory helps ur computer to not suck.
how's ur wife's great aunt doing?
night caleb
ugh!
g'night tom
where's ur show? waiting on Let's Talk Sports...IM me when u see this tweet!!
where's ur show? waiting on kandwsports...IM me when u see this message!!
I love how u spell "chapstick"
later dude!
lol. 1 hour ago u said "bed" I guess u meant "i'm going to go flop myself down on my bed" and not"im going to sleep now"
uh oh. can u recalibrate it?
sorry about the bad mood
g'night caleb
night
my prayer is now for wisdom for the doctors and physical strength for the g. aunt!
lolk. i was just checking. cuz @JKL-Jon said he had been outside in shorts! that's plain nutz...ha ha sorry @JKL-Jon
Figure out who it is Ollie North refers to as PEBO
It is not the place of government to run the businesses of the free market
oh yeah, bcuz of my random tweet about the new Pokemon "carczar", I am now being followed by @carczar ...LOL
Good morning Twitterville! Be home around 8:30 pm...
bed soon. g'night twitterville
Retweeting @coffeebean71: want to talk about emerging christianity and holiness? http://www.cbchronicles.blogspot.com/
hanging out online with george.
ok, the player is NOW on www.chyea.tv...so, choose ur poison and join us...chyea.tv or stickam.com/aandmm
correction: you can NOT see tonight's show at www.chyea.tv you MUST go to stickam.com/aandmm sorry for the inconvenience

don't gorget about tech-time on chyea.tv in just under a half hour. www.chyea.tv or www.stickam.com/aandmm
home. ask me about municpal court. lol. let's see what the evening holds.
up. getting ready.
Watch The Weekly Wrap Up tonight on Chyea.tv 9 est
Barney Frank admits auto bailout is welfare
What or who is your "first thing"? What or who takes the place of highest importance in your life? Thanks for ur reply and retweet!
reposting my twitter question from last night. I would like more than one response from my followers & a courtesy retweet plz...thanks...
ooking for replies: What is your "first thing" in life? What(or whom) has greatest importance or highest priority? PLZ reply & retweet!!
looking for replies: What is your "first thing" in life? What(or whom) has greatest importance or highest priority?
reminder: Let's Talk Sports is LIVE right now www.Chyea.tv. Like sports, swing by plz!
Twitterville is very active tonight from my fellow twitheads
Retweeting @kandwsports: Let's Talk Sports tonight at 7pm EST. www.KandWsports.info.
home. had dinner. trying to figure out what my evening will look like. I'm sure it will include www.chyea.tv
Tis the season 2 b jolly. Sum1 4got 2 tell sum of the ppl i've seen 2day
awake. ugh. lol.
g'night Jon
plz watch, rate and comment my friends video http://tinyurl.com/6y8zwu

downside of afternoon naps...they have to come to an end...
Sunday afternoon naps...good stuff!
up for another day at work...yay! (ha ha)
i'm done. g'night
home. all i have to say is, "what recession?"
up for the day. cooooold.
time to leave twitterville for sleepytown...wow did i just type that? yes, as a matter of fact, i did!
